mapper.select: SELECT v.`id`, v.`shop_id`, v.`title`, v.`sub_title`, v.`rules`, v.`pay_value`, v.`actual_value`, v.`type`, v.`limit_type`, v.`user_limit`, v.`owner_type`, sv.`stock` , sv.begin_time , sv.end_time, sv.preheat_status FROM tb_voucher v LEFT JOIN tb_seckill_voucher sv ON v.id = sv.voucher_id WHERE v.shop_id = #{shopId} AND v.status = 1 AND (v.type = 0 OR (v.type = 1 AND sv.preheat_status >= 2))

SELECT v.`id`, v.`shop_id`, v.`title`, v.`sub_title`, v.`rules`, v.`pay_value`, v.`actual_value`, v.`type`, v.`limit_type`, v.`user_limit`, v.`owner_type`, v.`status`, sv.`stock` , sv.begin_time , sv.end_time, sv.preheat_status FROM tb_voucher v LEFT JOIN tb_seckill_voucher sv ON v.id = sv.voucher_id WHERE v.shop_id = #{shopId} ORDER BY v.create_time DESC
